alert.note: Alert for Bennington; Eastern Windham; Western Windham (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 06 at 8:11PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A line of showers with gusty winds will impact portions of east central Saratoga, southern Washington, Bennington and Windham Counties through 900 PM EST... At 810 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a line of showers with gusty winds near Saratoga Springs, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Saratoga Springs, Bellows Falls, Arlington, Londonderry, Townshend, Salem, Manchester, Stratton, Shaftsbury, Putney, Dorset, Cambridge, Greenwich, Saxtons River, Westminster, Newfane, Manchester Center, West Wardsboro, Windham and Gates. This includes Interstate 87 between exits 14 and 16. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
